00070 template<class InputIterator, typename _CharT, typename _Traits> std::basic_ostream<_CharT, _Traits> &
00071 listToOStream( InputIterator start, InputIterator end,
00072                std::basic_ostream<_CharT, _Traits> &o,
00073                const std::string delim = ",",
00074                const std::string prefix = "{", const std::string suffix = "}" )
00075 {
00076     o << prefix;
00077 
00078     if ( start != end ) {
00079         o << *start;
00080         start++;
00081     }
00082 
00083     for ( InputIterator i = start; i != end; i++ )
00084         o << delim << *i;
00085 
00086     o << suffix;
00087     return o;
00088 }
00089 
00090 // specialization to print char-list as number lists, not strings
00091 //@todo check if this works for VC
00092 template<typename _CharT, typename _Traits> std::basic_ostream<_CharT, _Traits> &
00093 listToOStream( const unsigned char *start, const unsigned char *end,
00094                std::basic_ostream<_CharT, _Traits> &o,
00095                const std::string delim = ",",
00096                const std::string prefix = "{", const std::string suffix = "}" )
00097 {
00098     o << prefix;
00099 
00100     if ( start != end ) {
00101         o << ( unsigned short )*start;
00102         start++;
00103     }
00104 
00105     for ( const unsigned char *i = start; i != end; i++ )
00106         o << delim << ( unsigned short )*i;
00107 
00108     o << suffix;
00109     return o;
00110 }

00113 template<class InputIterator> std::string listToString(
00114     InputIterator start, InputIterator end,
00115     const std::string delim = ",",
00116     const std::string prefix = "{", const std::string suffix = "}" )
00117 {
00118     std::ostringstream ret;
00119     listToOStream( start, end, ret, delim, prefix, suffix );
00120     return ret.str();
00121 }
00123 template<typename T, typename InputIterator> std::list<T> listToList( InputIterator start, InputIterator end )
00124 {
00125     std::list<T> ret;
00126 
00127     for ( ; start != end; start++ )
00128         ret.push_back( boost::lexical_cast<T>( *start ) );
00129 
00130     return ret;
00131 }

00145 template<typename TARGET> std::list<TARGET> stringToList(
00146     std::string source, const boost::regex &separator,
00147     boost::regex prefix, boost::regex postfix )
00148 {
00149     std::list<TARGET> ret;
00150     assert( ! separator.empty() );
00151 
00152     if ( ! prefix.empty() ) {
00153         if ( prefix.str()[0] != '^' )
00154             prefix = boost::regex( std::string( "^" ) + prefix.str(), prefix.flags() );
00155 
00156         source = boost::regex_replace( source, prefix, "", boost::format_first_only | boost::match_default );
00157     }
00158 
00159     if ( ! postfix.empty() ) {
00160         if ( postfix.str()[postfix.size() - 1] != '$' )
00161             postfix = boost::regex( postfix.str() + "$", postfix.flags() );
00162 
00163         source = boost::regex_replace( source, postfix, "", boost::format_first_only | boost::match_default );
00164     }
00165 
00166     boost::sregex_token_iterator i = boost::make_regex_token_iterator( source, separator, -1 );
00167     const boost::sregex_token_iterator token_end;
00168 
00169     while ( i != token_end ) {
00170         ret.push_back( boost::lexical_cast<TARGET>( ( i++ )->str() ) );
00171     }
00172 
00173     return ret;
00174 }
00184 template<typename TARGET> std::list<TARGET> stringToList(
00185     std::string source,
00186     const boost::regex separator = boost::regex( "[[:space:]]" ) )
00187 {
00188     return stringToList<TARGET>( source, separator, separator, separator );
00189 }

00203 //@todo test
00204 template<typename TARGET, typename charT, typename traits> std::list<TARGET>
00205 stringToList( const std::basic_string<charT, traits> &source,  charT separator )
00206 {
00207     std::list<TARGET> ret;
00208 
00209     for (
00210         size_t next = source.find_first_not_of( separator );
00211         next != std::string::npos;
00212         next = source.find_first_not_of( separator, next )
00213     ) {
00214         const size_t start = next;
00215         next = source.find( separator, start );
00216         ret.push_back( boost::lexical_cast<TARGET>( source.substr( start, next - start ) ) );
00217     }
00218 
00219     return ret;
00220 }
00221 
00233 template<typename T> bool fuzzyEqual( T a, T b, unsigned short scale = 10 )
00234 {
00235     BOOST_MPL_ASSERT( ( boost::is_float<T> ) );
00236 
00237     const T epsilon = std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon(); // get the distange between 1 and the next representable value
00238     T bigger, smaller;
00239 
00240     a = std::abs( a );
00241     b = std::abs( b );
00242 
00243     if( a < b ) {
00244         bigger = b;
00245         smaller = a;
00246     } else {
00247         smaller = b;
00248         bigger = a;
00249     }
00250 
00251     if( smaller == 0 )
00252         return bigger < std::numeric_limits<T>::min() * scale;
00253 
00254     const T factor = 1 / smaller; // scale smaller to that value
00255     return ( bigger * factor ) <= ( 1 + epsilon * scale ); //scaled bigger should be between 1 and the next representable value
00256 }

00284 template<typename HANDLE> void enableLogGlobal( LogLevel level )
00285 {
00286     ENABLE_LOG( CoreLog, HANDLE, level );
00287     ENABLE_LOG( CoreDebug, HANDLE, level );
00288     ENABLE_LOG( ImageIoLog, HANDLE, level );
00289     ENABLE_LOG( ImageIoDebug, HANDLE, level );
00290     ENABLE_LOG( DataLog, HANDLE, level );
00291     ENABLE_LOG( DataDebug, HANDLE, level );

00298 template<typename charT, typename _FIRST, typename _SECOND > basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> >&
00299 operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> > &out, const pair<_FIRST, _SECOND> &s )
00300 {
00301     return out << s.first << ":" << s.second;

00305 template<typename charT, typename _Key, typename _Tp, typename _Compare, typename _Alloc >
00306 basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> >& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> > &out, const map<_Key, _Tp, _Compare, _Alloc>& s )
00307 {
00308     isis::util::listToOStream( s.begin(), s.end(), out, "\n", "", "" );
00309     return out;
00310 }
00311 
00313 template<typename charT, typename _Tp, typename _Compare, typename _Alloc >
00314 basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> >& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> > &out, const map<std::string, _Tp, _Compare, _Alloc>& s )
00315 {
00316     size_t key_len = 0;
00317     typedef typename map<std::string, _Tp, _Compare, _Alloc>::const_iterator m_iterator;
00318 
00319     for ( m_iterator i = s.begin(); i != s.end(); i++ )
00320         if ( key_len < i->first.length() )
00321             key_len = i->first.length();
00322 
00323     for ( m_iterator i = s.begin(); i != s.end(); ) {
00324         out << make_pair( i->first + std::string( key_len - i->first.length(), ' ' ), i->second );
00325 
00326         if ( ++i != s.end() )
00327             out << std::endl;
00328     }
00329 
00330     return out;
00331 }
00332 
00334 template<typename charT, typename _Tp, typename _Alloc >
00335 basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> >& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> > &out, const list<_Tp, _Alloc>& s )
00336 {
00337     isis::util::listToOStream( s.begin(), s.end(), out );
00338     return out;
00339 }
00341 template<typename charT, typename _Tp, typename _Alloc >
00342 basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> >& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> > &out, const set<_Tp, _Alloc>& s )
00343 {
00344     isis::util::listToOStream( s.begin(), s.end(), out );
